page.title: 15CLUBS FOR ALL IN STEWARTON
page.content: Uniformed organisations are under "at play". Young Farmers Clubs at Dunlop and Kilmaurs cater for those interested in the countryside and offer opportunities for farming, homecraft, competitions, discussions and sport. In Stewarton there is a very good drama group whose standard of productions is up to national competive standards. Each Christmas a pantomime is put on for the children. One act and three act plays are also performed in the Institute Hall. The senior citizens have a Thursday club in the Centre where they are entertained and can have a talk and a cup of tea. There are also the following clubs- winemakers,tufty,rifle,archery,golf, and darts.There is a freemason meeting in their hall in Springwell Place.
